text: Hello everyone! A client has been using a custom contact property within a group instead of the default “First Name”. Our app currently only loads and uses contact information fields. Is there a way to display the content of their custom property within any contact information field?
Can't you change the group of the custom property?
is there any plan to add "search" to graphql queries? general search would be great but more specifically I need some additional values that regular search does not return (widgets mostly)
currently the plan is to run an extra query after getting the id of certain returned items
